pages.text: Dwarves are sturdy, short creatures known for their affinity with the earth. They can mine without a pickaxe and excel at digging ores and blocks faster than any other race. Their ability to pass through tight spaces and see in the dark gives them an advantage in underground environments.
However, the sun blinds them, and they drown quickly in water. Their strength and resilience underground make them excellent miners, though they must be cautious above ground.
